TestInformation.Title: NAMD CUDA
TestInformation.Description: NAMD is a parallel molecular dynamics code designed for high-performance simulation of large biomolecular systems. NAMD was developed by the Theoretical and Computational Biophysics Group in the Beckman Institute for Advanced Science and Technology at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign. This version of the NAMD test profile uses CUDA GPU acceleration; the non-CUDA version of this test profile is pts/namd.
TestInformation.SubTitle: ATPase Simulation - 327,506 Atoms
